summary: Adds a new kind of shrine and a respective custom-textured amulet above the entrance to Eldergleam Sanctuary
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Arial][size=4][i][b]Have you ever wondered why there is no shrine built to one the most hated creatures in all of Skyrim? Look no further, this mod has anything a true mudcrab worshipper would ever need. Just like for the other divines, this mod comes with a shrine and a custom-textured amulet. [/b][/i][/size][/font][/center]

~~~~[size=4][b]Wat[/b][/size]~~~~
[color=#f4f4f4]-A shrine...to the almighty [i]Mundus Crab.[/i] 

-With mudcrabby mudcrab worshippers protecting it... 

-And one of them is carrying the amulet...of the Mundus Crab [/color]

~~~~[size=4][b]Why[/b][/size]~~~~
[color=#f4f4f4]-Originally requested by a friend ( about half of my published mods are friends-only ) 

-Then I found out how to retexture things ( excitement! ) 

-I decided this needed an amulet 

-Then I decided this a good enough for publi[i]c[/i]shing [/color]

~~~~[size=4][b]Were[/b][/size]~~~~
[color=#f4f4f4][i]wolf.[/i] [/color]

~~~~[size=4]*[b]Where[/b][/size]~~~~
[color=#f4f4f4]Above the entrace to Eldergleam Sanctuary, up on the hill. 
If you see the shrine and some mudcrabs, you're near it [/color]

~~~~[size=4][b]Credits[/b][/size]~~~~
[url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EzoazPPC7b8&feature=youtu.be&t=1m19s]Click here[/url]
author: McBook
